title._content: Image taken from page 60 of 'Sketches illustrating the Early Settlement and History of Glengarry in Canada, relating principally to the Revolutionary War of 1775-83, the War of 1812-14 and the Rebellion of 1837-8, etc'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Sketches illustrating the Early Settlement and History of Glengarry in Canada, relating principally to the Revolutionary War of 1775-83, the War of 1812-14 and the Rebellion of 1837-8, etc" Author: MACDONELL, John Alexander - of Greenfield Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 010460.h.16." Page: 60 Place of Publishing: Montreal Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: W. Foster, Brown & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002311185 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
